name: Mario the Elephant
description:
Putting bananas inside your elephant mouth is rather difficult when your trunk is ridiculously powerful. Having a superpower brings some complications too... Can you overcome them? Take the challenge of wielding your supermassive trunk in an attempt of eating bananas!  🐘🍌

The project is one in the series of rapid prototypes made in less than a week. The intention of making games in team of 3 in extremely short development cycles was learning the methods and theory in order to develop game ideas into testable prototypes as quick as possible.
